security: The document contains personal information such as name, date of birth, and military service number which, if disclosed, could violate privacy.
summary: This document is an identification form and exhibit cover sheet related to Manuel Marti, including his birthdate and father's birth certificate. It's a report from the 771st MI Detachment in Puerto Rico dated September 24, 1968.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a document from the JFK Assassination System, released under the John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Collection Act. It's an Identification Form and Exhibit Cover Sheet concerning Manuel Marti, a Private E-1 in the U.S. Army, born on May 17, 1946, in San Juan, Puerto Rico. The document includes a report from the 771st MI Detachment, Fort Brooke, Puerto Rico, dated September 24, 1968, and concerns the birth certificate of Marti's father, filed under file number 8240-6019, 093-36-4601.
title: [RESTRICTED]
